result.title: Coding Enthusiast: 1
result.content:
Please discuss problems here.

You can post questions, hints, comments, and such.

Just make sure you won't ruin other people's experience!!

(For example, don't put your solution before the contest ends. or you can update your comment just like the first comment I made for this post)

UPD:

Now that the contest is over, please share what you think about this contest.

Are there too many problems? Are those problems too difficult? Any other comment? What do you think we should do with this? Discuss problems? Share solution?
